ai-patthana23.44:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.44:0.3_0: for one who remembers what is called rejection of requisites,
ai-patthana23.44:1.1_0: Not applied and sustained thought, without sustained thought, with no placing of the mind and keeping it connected are conditions for the sake of impingement, not placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-patthana23.44:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.44:2.1_0: Not applied and sustained thought, without sustained thought, with sustained thought as condition, and with no placing the mind and keeping it connected are conditions for the sake of this, because of this is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana23.44:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.44:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. Mindfulness without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. That is a cause or reason for the sake of this.
ai-patthana23.44:3.1_1: the reason why the objects of construction ...
